abstract_concepts.name: Abstract Concepts & Philosophy
abstract_concepts.description: Abstract concepts, philosophy, completion, existence, hope, and self-related kanji

human_relationships.name: Human Relationships & Society
human_relationships.description: Family relationships, social interactions, cooperation, and human connections

physical_world.name: Physical World & Nature
physical_world.description: Natural elements, body parts, materials, and physical phenomena

actions_processes.name: Actions & Processes
actions_processes.description: Verbs and actions including changing, supporting, comparing, hitting, paying, and various movements

communication_expression.name: Communication & Expression
communication_expression.description: Communication, speaking, reporting, expressing preferences, and social courtesies

spatial_temporal.name: Spatial & Temporal Concepts
spatial_temporal.description: Inside/outside, directions, sequences, time, existence in space, and locations

governance_administration.name: Governance & Administration
governance_administration.description: Leadership, public affairs, ceremonies, official duties, and institutional structures

conflict_competition.name: Conflict & Competition
conflict_competition.description: Competition, danger, conflict, and forms of struggle

daily_objects.name: Daily Objects & Materials
daily_objects.description: Household items, books, clothing, food, housing, and daily necessities

states_conditions.name: States & Conditions
states_conditions.description: Emotional and physical states including necessity, business, comfort, and trouble

learning_knowledge.name: Learning & Knowledge
learning_knowledge.description: Education, learning processes, knowledge acquisition, and academic pursuits

business_economics.name: Business & Economics
business_economics.description: Commerce, trade, business operations, economic activities, and market conditions

technology_systems.name: Technology & Systems
technology_systems.description: Mechanical systems, manufacturing, equipment, and technological processes

emotions_psychology.name: Emotions & Psychology
emotions_psychology.description: Emotional states, psychological concepts, feelings, and mental processes

medicine_health.name: Medicine & Health
medicine_health.description: Medical terms, health concepts, treatment, and healthcare-related vocabulary

arts_culture.name: Arts & Culture
arts_culture.description: Artistic expression, cultural activities, music, visual arts, and creative pursuits

advanced_verbs.name: Advanced Verbs & Complex Actions
advanced_verbs.description: Complex verbs involving thinking, researching, deciding, evaluating, and advanced cognitive processes

measurements_quantities.name: Measurements & Quantities
measurements_quantities.description: Measurements, quantities, statistics, standards, and numerical concepts

legal_formal.name: Legal & Formal Concepts
legal_formal.description: Legal terminology, formal agreements, regulations, and official procedures

science_research.name: Science & Research
science_research.description: Scientific concepts, research methodology, theories, discoveries, and analytical thinking

complex_social_structures.name: Complex Social Structures
complex_social_structures.description: Complex social organizations, environmental conditions, institutional structures, and societal concepts

specialized_terminology.name: Specialized Terminology
specialized_terminology.description: Specialized professional and technical terminology across various fields including finance, employment, and industry

remaining_kanji.name: Additional Complex Kanji
remaining_kanji.description: Complex kanji covering difficulty levels, safety concepts, management, planning, and various systematic approaches

summary.description: All 464 N3 kanji have been categorized into 24 thematic groups that reflect the increased complexity and abstraction typical of intermediate-level Japanese. Categories include abstract concepts, complex social structures, specialized terminology, and advanced cognitive processes that are essential for intermediate Japanese proficiency.
